Translations.Text: Nos sent Noah his people he stayed them 1000 annus minus 50. Subsequently they incurred flood their transgressions
Nos saved eum those accompanied eum ark nos set it lesson totus people
Abraham dictus to his people Vos worship DEUS reverence Eum! Hoc est bene vos si vos unus knew

Quod vos worship DEUS est powerless idols; vos invented lie idols vos worship DEUS non possess any provisions vos! Ergo vos seek provisions unus ex DEUS. Vos worship Eum alone est appreciative de Eum; Eum est tuus ultimate return
Vos disbelieve generations vos alias disbelieved sole function messenger est deliver message
Habet they non vide quam DEUS initiates creation tunc! repeats it Hoc est easy DEUS perfecit
Dictus Roam terra invenit out generis vita. Pro DEUS testimentum sic initiate creation Hereafter DEUS est Omnipotent
He condemns retribution whomever He testimentum showers His mercy whomever He testimentum. Ultimately to Eum vos est turned over
Nullus de vos escape these facts terra caelum vos habet nullus DEUS prout Dominus Magister
